1.name: Defense (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Health (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Empty Fortress Strategem
3.text: While this commander is serving as garrison commander, increases damage dealt to attacking armies by ${1}%

4.name: Attack (All Troops)
4.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

5.name: Impenetrable Fortifications
5.text: When this commander is serving as garrison commander, damage taken by the garrison from the attacking army is reduced by ${1}%

6.name: Defense (All Troops)
6.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

7.name: Impregnable
7.text: When this commander is serving as garrison commander, skill damage taken by the garrison is reduced by ${1}%

8.name: Adamantine Walls
8.text: Increases watchtower defense by ${1}% when this commander is serving as garrison commander

9.name: City Guardian
9.text: Increases watchtower attack by ${1}% when this commander is serving as garrison commander

10.name: Nowhere To Turn
10.text: When this commander is serving as garrison commander, grants an additional ${1} rage every time the city is attacked

11.name: Health (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Attack (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: Attack (All Troops)
13.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Defense (All Troops)
14.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

15.name: Defense (All Troops)
15.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

16.name: Health (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Know Thy Enemy
17.text: While this commander is serving as garrison commander, damage reduction effect is enhanced by ${1}% if the garrison becomes surrounded

18.name: March Speed (All Troops)
18.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

19.name: Kings Guard
19.text: Increases garrison attack, defense, and health by ${1}% when this commander is serving as garrison commander (no effect when garrisoning cities)

20.name: Divine Favor
20.text: When this commander is serving as garrison commander, gives the garrison a 10% chance to receive a damage-absorbing shield (Damage Factor ${1}) after being attacked
